node.statement: KEY LEMMA (Phi via derivative formula): Using MSS_derivative_formula, r'(x) = n*(p^{(1)} ⊞_{n-1} q^{(1)})(x). Since H_r(lambda_i) = r'(lambda_i)/(2r'(lambda_i)), and r'(lambda_i) can be expressed via the roots gamma_1,...,gamma_{n-1} of r' (which are roots of p^{(1)} ⊞_{n-1} q^{(1)}), we obtain Phi_n(r) = sum_{i=1}^n [sum_{k=1}^{n-1} 1/(lambda_i - gamma_k) - sum_{j!=i} 1/(lambda_i - lambda_j)]^2 / 4.
